create_enchantment_industry.gui.blaze_en: Este objeto no puede usarse como plantilla.
Normal Enchanting Template can't be used in Super Enchanting mode!
Super Enchanting Template requires Super Enchanting mode to use!
No se puede copiar el contenido de este objeto.
This book has no copiable enchantments.
This book contains an uncopiable enchantment.
Este libro no contiene encantamientos copiables.
Este libro no contiene texto para copiar.
create_enchantment_industry.ponder.blaze: Automating with Mechanical Arm
Blaze Enchanter can be automated with Mechanical Arm
Mechanical Arm can insert item for enchanting
Mechanical Arm also can feed experience fuel
Mechanical Arm can extract enchanted item and invalid item
Descubre el Encantador de Blaze
Este es el Encantador de Blaze, que funciona como una Mesa de Encantamiento
Because golden chest armor has better enchantability compared to diamond chest armor, it produces relatively better enchantments
However, higher Enchanting Level is not always better. Some enchantments will not appear when the Enchanting Level is too high!
Aliméntalo con Experiencia Líquida para ponerlo en marcha
Before enchanting with it, the enchant level must be set via the panel. The level cap of a vanilla enchanting table is 30
The panel is also a filter slot. Right click that slot with an item to designate that item as a template. This state is called Template Enchanting Mode
In Template Enchanting Mode, Blaze Enchanter can enchant Enchanting Template
Template Enchanting Mode is used to produce only enchantments supported by the template item
For example, placing diamond chest armor in the filter slot causes only diamond-chest-armor enchantments to be generated
Give a blank Enchanting Template to Blaze Enchanter, and the aforementioned enchantments will be added to it
Different materials and template item types will produce different enchantments
Super Enchanting with Blaze Enchanter
The Blaze Enchanter has two "stomachs". Feed it a Cake o' Enchanting...
...and it will begin seething. This state is known as Super Enchanting mode
The second tank of Blaze Enchanter can not be piped in for Liquid Experience. An eligible Super Experience item, such as Cake o' Enchanting, must be used
While in Super Enchanting mode, the enchant level cap is significantly increased. Additionally, the Enchanter can now produce Treasure Enchantments
Blaze Enchanter in Super Enchanting mode exclusively processes Super Enchanting Templates
Make sure to place a Lightning Rod nearby
El Súper Encantamiento puede atraer rayos
Puedes proteger el Encantador de Blaze de los rayos con un bloque, pero corres el riesgo de atraer una maldición
If no Lightning Rods are present...
Automating with Mechanical Arm
Blaze Forger can be automated with Mechanical Arm
Mechanical Arm can insert item for forging
Mechanical Arm also can feed experience fuel
Mechanical Arm can extract forged item
Descubre el Forjador de Blaze
Este es el Forjador de Blaze, que funciona como un Yunque
Aliméntalo con Experiencia Líquida para ponerlo en marcha
El Forjador de Blaze puede fusionar encantamientos del mismo objeto como un yunque, pero sin "coste de reparación"
También puede fusionar Plantillas de Encantamiento
Y lo más importante, ¡puede aplicar Plantillas de Encantamiento a los objetos!
Además, el Forjador de Blaze puede transferir encantamientos de equipo, libros o Plantillas de Encantamiento a una Plantilla de Encantamiento vacía.
Super Enchanting with Blaze Forger
The Blaze Forger has two "stomachs". Feed it a Cake o' Enchanting...
...and it will begin seething, and enter Super Enchanting mode
The second tank of Blaze Forger can not be piped in for Liquid Experience. An eligible Super Experience item, such as Cake o' Enchanting, must be used
While in Super Enchanting mode, Blaze Forger can surpass the vanilla enchantment level cap while merging enchantments. Conflicting enchantments can also be merged together
Blaze Forger in Super Enchanting mode exclusively processes and applies Super Enchanting Templates
Make sure to place a Lightning Rod nearby
El Súper Forjado puede atraer rayos
Puedes proteger el Forjador de Blaze de los rayos con un bloque, pero corres el riesgo de aumentar el "coste de reparación".
If no Lightning Rods are present...
create_enchantment_industry.ponder.exper: Cosas que te conviene saber
Hay algunas cosas que debes saber antes de empezar a trabajar con encantamientos
El Bloque de Experiencia ya no es solo un adorno o un almacén. Lo necesitarás más adelante.
Block of Experience is required to make both the Enchantment Template and the Block of Super Experience
This is Block of Super Experience, used to make Super Enchanting Templates
Encantador de Blaze
Forjador de Blaze
Seething Blaze Forgers and Enchanters are in Super Enchanting mode
Super Enchanting allows you to surpass traditional enchanting limits
Specifically, this includes exceeding the vanilla enchantment level cap, merging conflicting enchantments, and obtaining treasure enchantments directly
As Beacon base block
Introducción al Manejo de la Experiencia
This is a tank of Liquid Experience, the primary form of Experience used in Enchantment Industry
Use spout to refill Liquid Experience into a container item
Liquid Experience leaking from pipes will turn into Experience orbs
Para convertir tu experiencia en forma líquida, necesitarás dos componentes
Usa un Conducto de Líquido para extraer líquidos directamente de los objetos
Usa una Madriguera de Experiencia para acceder a tu propia experiencia
Pero esto es Create, la automatización es esencial, ¿verdad?
Puedes usar un Drenaje de Objeto para verter Experiencia Líquida desde objetos
Mechanical Grindstone can also pulverize items. For example, it can convert Experience Nuggets into Liquid Experience
La Rueda de Trituración ahora tiene una función adicional: puede soltar una pequeña cantidad de pepitas de experiencia al matar criaturas
Similarly, Deployer now drops Experience Nuggets after killing a creature
Preparativos para el Súper Encantamiento
First, obtain a Block of Super Experience, which will be used to make the Super Enchanting Template. This requires Block of Experience
Next, place a Lightning Rod
¡Que caiga un Rayo!
The vast majority of lightning strikes only have a certain probability of transforming Block of Experience, and only lightning strikes caused by Super Enchanting are guaranteed to transform
Second, obtain Cake o' Enchanting. It works as "Super Experience" and causes Blazes to enter Super Enchanting mode.
If Cake o' Enchanting is used to put Blaze into Super Enchanting mode, what is Block of Super Experience used for?
Answer: Crafting Super Enchanting Template
In Super Enchanting mode, Blaze Forgers and Enchanters will not accept any normal Enchanting Templates and must use the Super Enchanting Template
Descubre la Madriguera de Experiencia
Es muy fácil de usar. Haz clic derecho en la Madriguera para almacenar Experiencia...
...Mantén Shift y haz clic derecho para extraer la Experiencia almacenada
Tiene una ranura de filtro y un dial. Configura la cantidad de Experiencia por interacción en el dial
La ranura de filtro sirve para fluidos de experiencia de otros mods
For example, assume that Liquid Cyan Dye is experience fluid from another mod
Place Bucket of Cyan Dye in the filter slot
You can now directly insert and extract Cyan Dye as "Cyan Experience"
Introduction to Experience Lantern
Experience Lantern absorbs experience from nearby players and experience orb. It glows according to the amount of experience stored internally
Experience Lantern also works on Contraption
create_enchantment_industry.ponder.mecha: La Amoladora Mecánica no solo tiene las funciones de una amoladora...
...sino también las de papel de lija
Items can be manually applied to Mechanical Grindstone
Right-click an Item Drain with Mechanical Grindstone...
This is a Grindstone Drain. Place another Mechanical Grindstone on top to use it
La experiencia en forma de objeto puede triturarse y convertirse en Experiencia Líquida con la Amoladora Mecánica
create_enchantment_industry.ponder.print: Before use, set the item to print via the filter slot...
It can also name items, copy train schedule, copy clipboard, change package address and more. Use JEI to look up printing recipe
